ing: 1/4 cup raisins, or more to taste
des: "Are you a fan of traditional carrot raisin salad? Well, say goodbye to the heavy, mayo-ridden carrot raisin salads of the past and hello to this one with a yogurt base. It may sound strange, but once you try it this way, you may never go back to the original. Hope you enjoy it!!!"
ins: Mix yogurt and pineapple in a bowl until blended; fold in carrots and raisins.
